name: Supermarket Royale
description:
Welcome to Supermarket Royale

Race against your friends in this chaotic supermarket party game, where everyone’s competing for the Crown. But beware of thieves…

Characteristics

- 4 Players

- Controller only

Team

Victor Chiorean - Producer

Loïc Lanternier - Game Designer 

Florian Letourneur - Game Designer

Mark Kadzharov -  Game Designer

Théo Boldireff - Programmer

Dorian Gélas - Programmer

Yoan Agostini - Game Artist
